accordion.subject: Accordion
accordion.description: An accordion allows users to toggle the display of sections of content

alert.subject: Alert
alert.description: An alert can be used instead of 'alert()' to provide feedback messages.

checkbox.subject: Checkbox
checkbox.description: A checkbox allows a user to select a value from a small set of options, often binary

confirm.subject: Confirm
confirm.description: A confirm can be used instead of 'confirm()' to provide confirmation messages.

dropdown.subject: Dropdown
dropdown.description: A dropdown allows a user to select a value from a series of options

modal.subject: Modal
modal.description: A modal displays content that temporarily blocks interactions with the main view of a site

pagination.subject: Pagination
pagination.description: A component to render a pagination.

popup.subject: Popup
popup.description: A popup displays additional information on top of a page

progress.subject: Progress
progress.description: A progress bar shows the progression of a task

radio.subject: Radio
radio.description: A checkbox allows a user to select a value from a small set of options, often binary

rating.subject: Rating
rating.description: A rating indicates user interest in content

tab.subject: Tab
tab.description: A tab is a hidden section of content activated by a menu

table.subject: Table
table.description: A table displays a collections of data grouped into rows

validation-error.subject: Validation Error
validation-error.description: A validation-error indicate the reason for the validation error
